title: Vigi Witch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, if there is a TK role present in the game, you will know who they are, what their role is, and be able to control them.
- If there's no role that exists like that, you have a 50 50 chance to either become an Imposter (241) or re-roll into another Coven role because you suck

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - With the Necromonicon, you may now choose a different Coven role to play as and get to keep the Necronomicon

desc:
Post 3624
"If you make more coven roles in gim they would canonically be added to the necronomicon."
